'''Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone''' is a subevent during [[Roses and Muskets]].<!--

It can be accessed from the ? icon.-->

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone 1.png
|text1  = In Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone, you will use special optical lenses to aim and shoot opponents.<br>{{Color|help|Press the Aim button to start aiming}}. Aim at your targets and {{Color|help|press the Shoot button to fire bullets at the target your lens is aimed at}}. Defeat all opponents to complete the challenge.
|image2 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone 2.png
|text2  = Ammunition is limited in some scenarios. {{Color|help|Utilize the limited ammunition to defeat all enemies}}.
|image3 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone 3.png
|text3  = Adjust {{Color|help|Horizontal Camera Sensitivity (Aimed Shot Mode)}} and {{Color|help|Vertical Camera Sensitivity (Aimed Shot Mode)}} under Controls in the Settings menu to improve your ability to control your simulated shots.
}}

;High-Value Target
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Roses and Muskets Thousand-Pace Interdiction Arcminute Sharpshooting Zone High-Value Target 1.png
|text1  = A High-Value Target may appear in certain scenarios. {{color|help|Defeat all enemies while protecting this target}}.
}}
